title: About Improving my Gameplay

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Hi guys,

Firstly Happy New Year everyone =)
I am not sure that this is the correct place to ask for help or input to improve my gameplay.

So here is my stats lately: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=ronystark
My choice of champions are either Akali or Annie.

My situation is that for early-mid phase, my team tends to do well.
However at mid-late game, team starts to throw, dueling 3v5 etc. despite my warn ping and chat not to start any fight without all the team members present.

Is there anything that I can do to stop them to throw?
Should I join them and ignore farming cs from mid-late game?

I am looking forward for your positive informative input =)

Cheers,
R

replies.body:
If they start to 3v5, let them die.

But not all games are like this right?

The last 5 of my losses are like that.
In addition, there is a victory In my match history where my score is: 12 / 1 / 6.
My team also did the 3v5 or something around that numbers,
The reason why its a victory is because the enemy team has afk Riven.
